summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3373, for the improvement of West 51st Street, from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 6th Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41795 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
